A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was not a Star Wars movie. I’m not sure what it was. You can try new things and deviate from the formula while still staying true to the universe and spirit of the films\, but this was not that. Self aware humor that winks at the viewer and pulls them out of the movie\, entire plots that prove to have occurred for no appreciable reason\, and repetitive social commentary (“toxic masculinity) that\, while may make a good point as a sub plot\, doesn’t need to hijack the entire movie. What is the film supposed to be about anyway? I thought we were gearing up for Rey’s journey\, not tearing down all the other characters personality traits while leaving Rey’s growth to be a sideshow. Also\, alien cow nipples? Come on.
